channel.title: How i can log on on a mopar server (private)
channel.description:
i cant connect a server but i cant understand why i put
IP: 111.111.1111.11 PORT: 11111
and appears this:
unexpected server response please try using in a different worl
why?? i am noob and i want to play any server any :|

item.title: How i can log on on a mopar server (private)
item.dc:creator: @InternalorExternalCo InternalorExternalCommand
item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

Go download Moparscape 3.2. Here -->http://www.moparisthebest.com/moparscape.html

For hamachi go here --> http://www.hamachi.cc/

After thats downloaded click Create or join networks.

For creatng a network you should be the one running the server.

Enter the name of networks that relates to your servers name.
Example
Testscape1
Testscape2
Testscape3

Pass- test

For joining a server’s hamachi network.“Join Network”

Then enter the Hamachi name that it tells you.

Enter the password it says.

Example
!TestScape!

Hamachi Networks
Testscape1
Testscape2
Testscape3

Pass- test

If your looking to join a server.

[ul][li]Make sure you have typed in the right IP and port[/li]
[li]Make sure if the server requires hamachi you have it downloaded and read above what to do.[/li][/ul]

Changeing the port

If you have moparscape 3.2 downloaded

Go to

[ul][li]File[/li]
[li]New Port[/li]
[li]Type in the port for the server[/li]
[li]Make sure your Server’s ip is right.[/li][/ul]

Read full topic

item.title: How i can log on on a mopar server (private)
item.dc:creator: @_0mfg0rz ~0mfg0rz~
item.description:
@_0mfg0rz wrote:

~~ Step one~~

  1. first if you wanna get on other people’s server’s you go to Moparscape.org > RS PriavateServer Development > Moparscape Advertisment.

Step two
click on one you like for ex mine is … ( not up atm )
hamatchi for no-ip’s you should time [servername].no-ip.[info, org, etc]
for hamatchi go to this link …
Hamatchi.cc

Step three
for hamatchi set ups when you want to get on there server just do this …
it says something like …
network - Ashley_PK ( that’s mine for a ex )
pass - 123 (ex)

then it tell’s an ip # you can press file new ip or just fill in the blank below the password space

Step four
changeing the port -
to change the port simply press file change port - then it should say something…

the obvious’s are 5555 43594 or defualt…

Step five

           THE END :D

    hope i helped
                         ~0mfg0rz~

Read full topic
item.source: How i can log on on a mopar server (private)

item.title: How i can log on on a mopar server (private)
item.dc:creator: @driger driger
item.description:
@driger wrote:

Well, theres lots of ways you can do this.

STEP 1.

Load the moparscape page (with the cars on it)

STEP 2.

Click “Start Server” then go back to logging in.

STEP 3.

make your own username, and your own password you'll remember
example:

Username: Myusernameis
Password:*********
ip: <---------- look at step 3 for this.

STEP 3.

THE SERVER IP.

THERES LOTS OF WAYS YOU CAN DO THIS. Alot of people don’t have the no-ip way of doing this, say they have whats called a hamachi. It’s pretty much just a network that allows you to do all this… stuff… nothing that important. If you don’t want to go through with downloading the hamachi files and learning how to work it, you don’t have too! Look on the server advertisements and look at peoples server. Look for the ones that use examples like this:
“Hamahci: heck no, hamachi stinks”
“hamachi: no, nada, whatever else you wanna say”
All you have to do in this server, is type in the given ip adress in the ip spot. example:
Ip: Drigerscape.no-ip.info
STEP 4.

So.. your too lazy feeling to look up anything? Get info? (no offence  :D).. Well, you don't have to! When you load mopar.. and click "Start server" theres already an ip in there that is somthing like- 
 ip: 127.0.0.1
Just make your username and click "log-in" there are no other players, and it can get kinda boring, but lazyness get's lazy results! (NOT SYAING YOUR LAZY, THATS JSUT THE LAZY WAY HEHE!)

Read full topic

item.title: How i can log on on a mopar server (private)
item.dc:creator: @Greenspirit Greenspirit
item.description:
@Greenspirit wrote:

Ip. Well my server it says Ip 5.124.1.219 So you type that ip at “Ip”
Port Well when you look at the client in the left corner ( above ) you will see file click on it then click on new port Mine server use port 5555 so put on that port
Some servers need hamachi www.hamachi.cc download it and enter SawScape1 with pass 123 just remb what i said if you need help if you understand it ofcourse this is what i need 2 do before i log in:

Username: Greenspirit
Password: ********
Server Ip: 5.124.1.219

Then i go to file and change port to 5555
Then i log on the network thats on hamachi ( dont have to do this more then once )

Then i log in server and play
hope it helps if you need more simple ask
